titles.title: Zelda no Densetsu: Majora no Kamen
The Legend of Zelda: Legendary Edition
ゼルダの伝説 ムジュラの仮面
The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask

title: Zelda no Densetsu: Majora no Kamen
title_english: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
title_japanese: ゼルダの伝説 ムジュラの仮面
title_synonyms: The Legend of Zelda: Legendary Edition
synopsis:
Based off the popular N64 game. Looking for a old friend in the lost woods, Link soon finds himself thrown into a parallel world by the mischievous actions of a possessed Skull Kid. Link finds a land in grave danger. The dark power of a relic called Majora's Mask has wreaked havoc on the citizens of Termina, but their most urgent problem is a suicidal moon crashing toward the world. Link has only 72 hours to find a way to stop its descent.

(Source: ANN)
background: Zelda no Densetsu: Majora no Kamen was published in English as The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask, the third volume in the The Legend of Zelda series, by VIZ Media under the VIZ Kids imprint on February 3, 2009. It was also included in the 10-volume box set released October 25, 2011. The series was rereleased, alongside , as the third volume of VIZ Media's The Legend of Zelda: Legendary Edition on March 14, 2017.
